CustomField.formula: if(Account_Plan_Company_Profile__r.isMiniMode__c, Account_Plan_Completion_Percentage_SE__c , if(isblank( Account_Plan_Group_Profile__c ), (Step_2_Percentage__c + Step_3_Percentage__c + Step_4_Percentage__c + Step_5_Percentage__c )/4 , (Step_1_Percentage__c + Step_2_Percentage__c + Step_3_Percentage__c + Step_4_Percentage__c + Step_5_Percentage__c )/5 ) )
CustomField.label: Account Plan Completion Percentage
